title: Tenchi Muyou! in Love 2: Haruka Naru Omoi (Tenchi Forever!)
synopsis: Tenchi runs off into the woods to spend some time alone after his friends have another argument. While lost in thought, he hears a voice coming from a camellia tree. Tenshi approaches it and vanishes through a portal.
related_anime: ['Tenchi Muyou! in Love', 'Tenchi Muyou! in Love 2: Eternal Memory']
